title: The 97th Annual Academy Awards Official Discussion Thread
text: It's time for the **97th annual Academy Awards**! Share your thoughts and reactions here as the evening unfolds! Please use our [**how to watch**](https://www.reddit.com/r/Oscars/comments/1j24mf3/how_to_watch_this_years_oscars_ceremony/) thread for ways to view the ceremony. Links posted elsewhere will be removed.
author: tragopanic
